# API Reference for cdktf.ITokenMapper

   ITokenMapper <a name="ITokenMapper" id="cdktf.ITokenMapper"></a>
  
  - *Implemented By:* <a href="#cdktf.ITokenMapper">ITokenMapper</a>
  
  Interface to apply operation to tokens in a string.
  
  Interface so it can be exported via jsii.
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenMapper.mapToken">MapToken</a></code> | Replace a single token. |
